name: SkyGiraffe
description:
This is a parody of QWOP. Here, the clumsy sky giraffe wandering among the clouds, moving around and falling from the clouds, until it finds its leafy endpoint.

---

Control instruction:

WASD keys to move

---

This is the project for experimenting different physics components in Unity.  Work is generally for the course Intermediate Game Dev, assignment week 3.

GitHub link: https://github.com/bowencraft/SkyGiraffe

--- Copyright Information:
  • Background music: Music by MarilynFord from Pixabay
